explanation: [0-0] A man in a yellow shirt is standing in front of a brick house, holding an orange-green drone in one hand and a remote controller in the other. The brick house in the background is red with a green tree inside. There is a caption "Top5" at the top of the screen and a caption "Experiment" at the bottom.

[0-3] The scene switches to a split-screen video. The upper part shows Iron Man sucking a can of drink into his palm. The lower part shows a man in a blue shirt and a blue cap sitting at a black table with a laptop and a black cup on it. There is a caption "My TikTok Video" at the top and a caption "2018" at the bottom. As the device in the man's hand lights up, the cup flies towards his hand on its own.
